Items.Title: Oversight - Let Them Play: Access to Schoolyards Outside of School Hours
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Let Them Play: Access to Schoolyards Outside of School Hours

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York City Department of Education to make schoolyards available for public use outside of school hours.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Dep't of Education to hold open for public use, outside of school hours, playgrounds located on school property.
